page.title: 19Amenities in St.Ouen.
page.content: The largest shop in St. Ouen's village is Briggs, it has five sections, household goods, grocery, toys and books, a Post Office and a hairdressers. Nearby there is a newsagents called Earlybird, which also sells groceries. There is also a boutique selling ladies clothes. Highmarch Stores is another grocery shop which is open from 8a.m. to 8p.m. so that the farm workers are able to do their shopping after working hours. The Community Centre has clubs for children in the evening and is used by many local organisations during the day. Next to this is the Parish Hall, the public administration and welfare centre, which is also used as the entertainment centre, for public meetings and for jumble sales. A very popular meeting place for the farm workers is the Farmer's Inn.
